body_html:
For sources that bazel generates, the force_pic flag listed here: https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/bazel-user-manual.html seems to indicate the default is off for static files.

This general stack overflow question has some things to try:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29200461/recompile-with-fpic-flag
e.g. - can we find a libgomp.pic.a instead of libgomp.a to use? Where is the libgomp dependency coming from?

body:
For sources that bazel generates, the force_pic flag listed here: https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/bazel-user-manual.html seems to indicate the default is off for static files.

This general stack overflow question has some things to try:
  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29200461/recompile-with-fpic-flag
e.g. - can we find a libgomp.pic.a instead of libgomp.a to use?  Where is the libgomp dependency coming from?
